data.name: Angstrage
data.detailed_description:
-Angstrage is a simple 2D platform game full of traps, which tests your patience. No checkpoint, no bonuses, nothing extra only your dexterity and patience matter.
If you think you have it in you, put yourself to the test and take it all the way.


-If you like rage games, then you are in the right place. Angstrage is a simple rage game with 10 levels full of hidden traps .The game has a bit of an old vibe, the graphics and controls are also simple but still very enjoyable.

Good Fun or Rage !

data.short_description: Angstrage is a simple 2D platform game full of traps, which tests your patience. No checkpoint, no bonuses, nothing extra only your dexterity and patience matter. If you think you have it in you, put yourself to the test and take it all the way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb video memory
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina or later
  • Processor: Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
